name: **Loftus Hall**
description: Loftus Hall X738-994 Sheet 76 2km NNE of Hook Head on the W (estuary) side, a sandy beach, locally called “Boyces Bay”, well sheltered, with no public access, under the impressive Loftus Hall, once a nunnery, one huge square old building dominating the view as one drives the Hook. Lumsdins
